column4: greetings, I have some trouble with nvidia gt550M driver. When i change from generic driver to nvidia it it startx doesnt work
is there any information about this? ubunut 10.10
Did you reboot after installing nvidia driver?
yeap
but doesnt start
Did you use the restricted driver tool in ubuntu to install it?
yes. and that is the problem. when i install that driver and reboot. screen doesnt come.
you're using 10.10 I assume?
yes i wrote
I'm looking into it
How new is your laptop?  And did it work on another version of ubuntu?
pretty new :) 1 day old
this is first install on that machine
lol I'm seeing as much.  You might have to install these drivers from a binary source like the nvidia website
do they avaible on nvidia site?
I'm looking, you'll have to check too.  I'm not sure what they are under.
sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg
try that command for now
doesnt that dont help :(
I can't even find a binary of your driver.  You may need to wait for a driver update for your card.
ok i wll thnx for help.
I apologize that I don't have an answer for it.  You just bought a computer that was TOO amazing :)
